rows.label: tlk70000042_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I've got enough fish to supply Chiko-san
and the other merchants in town now.
It's all thanks to you, you know.

rows.label: tlk70000042_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Things are looking up. I'm actually
pretty surprised how many people were
thrilled to see me back in business.

rows.label: tlk70000042_01_msg0003
rows.name:
After all, Iirans tend to prefer
beans and Kordeth. I didn't realise
so many people cared about my fish!

rows.label: tlk70000042_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I think folks're still a bit scared. Maybe
seeing the fish thriving helps reassure
them we can get things back to normal.
